problem_names:
lemma elem1:
  "C (AllowPortFromTo x y p \<oplus> DenyAllFromTo x y) = C (DenyAllFromTo x y)"

lemma elem2:
  "C ((a \<oplus> b) \<oplus> c) = C (a \<oplus> (b \<oplus> c))"

lemma elem3:
  "C (AllowPortFromTo x y a \<oplus> AllowPortFromTo x y b) = 
  C (AllowPortFromTo x y b \<oplus> AllowPortFromTo x y a)"

lemma elem5:
  "C (DenyAllFromTo x y \<oplus> DenyAllFromTo u v) = C (DenyAllFromTo u v \<oplus> DenyAllFromTo x y)"

lemma elem6: 
  "dom (C a) \<inter> dom (C b) = {} \<Longrightarrow> C (a \<oplus> b) = C (b \<oplus> a)"
translations:
lemma elem1:
  "C (AllowPortFromTo x y p \<oplus> DenyAllFromTo x y) = C (DenyAllFromTo x y)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. C (AllowPortFromTo x y p \<oplus> DenyAllFromTo x y) =
    C (DenyAllFromTo x y)

lemma elem2:
  "C ((a \<oplus> b) \<oplus> c) = C (a \<oplus> (b \<oplus> c))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. C ((a \<oplus> b) \<oplus> c) = C (a \<oplus> b \<oplus> c)

lemma elem3:
  "C (AllowPortFromTo x y a \<oplus> AllowPortFromTo x y b) = 
  C (AllowPortFromTo x y b \<oplus> AllowPortFromTo x y a)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. C (AllowPortFromTo x y a \<oplus> AllowPortFromTo x y b) =
    C (AllowPortFromTo x y b \<oplus> AllowPortFromTo x y a)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. C (a \<oplus> DenyAll) = C DenyAll

lemma elem5:
  "C (DenyAllFromTo x y \<oplus> DenyAllFromTo u v) = C (DenyAllFromTo u v \<oplus> DenyAllFromTo x y)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. C (DenyAllFromTo x y \<oplus> DenyAllFromTo u v) =
    C (DenyAllFromTo u v \<oplus> DenyAllFromTo x y)

lemma elem6: 
  "dom (C a) \<inter> dom (C b) = {} \<Longrightarrow> C (a \<oplus> b) = C (b \<oplus> a)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. dom (C a) \<inter> dom (C b) = {} \<Longrightarrow>
    C (a \<oplus> b) = C (b \<oplus> a)
